paragraphs.content: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

paragraphs.content: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

paragraphs.content: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.

paragraphs.content: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

paragraphs.content: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

paragraphs.content: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the Lord for ever.
